items.message: The risk of flooding in the London area has now reduced as the risk of thunderstorms has passed. No flooding is currently expected for today (Thursday 22 July), but there is further rainfall forecast for the weekend. We are monitoring this forecast closely and will issue further alerts if required.

floodArea.county: Birmingham, Dudley, Sandwell, Solihull, Walsall, Warwickshire, Wolverhampton

items.message: This flood alert has been issued as heavy rain and thunderstorms have been forecast for this area tonight (22/07/2021). There is uncertainty however, over the amount of rainfall expected and the exact location of these thunderstorms. River and surface water flooding may affect these areas. We urge you to remain vigilant and avoid walking and driving through flood water. We are continuing to actively monitor the situation closely and will issue updates, and further flood alerts and warnings if necessary. You can monitor your local weather conditions and river levels on the GOV.UK website.
